page.title: 10A FAMILY'S DAY part 2
page.content: The family are all together again for the main meal of the day, around 6pm. This has given the children time to do their homework while mother has been preparing the meal and their father has been making his way home from work. The family use this time together for catching up on each other's news and the events of the day. Later in the evening Clare goes off to Brownies, where she is a patrol leader and Dad goes out about 8pm.to the local Snooker Club. Mum has a chance to do her ironing while Daniel watches his favourite T.V. programme.
